useCase.name: Create Operation Type
useCase.description: An Admin creates a new Operation Type with its attributes

preconditions.precondition: The Admin is logged into the system

useCase.trigger: An Admin triggers the creation of a new Operation Type

mainSequence.step: Admin creates Operation Type with attributes
Web Interface forwards request to API
API saves the new Operation Type in the Database
API returns a confirmation to the Web Interface
Web Interface acknowledges confirmation to Admin
